attributes.action: all mp,s to say sorry for walking out whilst names of our armed forces who had died where read out
attributes.additional_details:
to ask all those that walked out whilst the names of our armed forces who had been killed were being read out to say sorry to the lady mp who was reading them out also to say sorry to our armed forces serving and non serving
every mp should sign a letter and for this letter to be sent to every newspaper and tv chanel in the united kingdom
